data.title: Chat Safe
data.overview: Teenagers that have similar interests, views, or experiences may find that internet chat rooms provide for a terrific place to hang out. But at the same time, the same site can also be a seedy backstreet that is crawling with sexual predators who operate online. In this section, you will become acquainted with some of the most typical risks associated with participating in online conversation and learn some ways to safeguard yourself from unexpected dangers.
